sentences.sContent: And the Mid-Autumn Festival for me, both enjoyable and warm, also have swept cardiopulmonary cold.
sentences.sContent_eng: And the Mid-Autumn Festival for me, both enjoyable and warm, also have swept cardiopulmonary cold.
sentences.sCn: 而中秋留给我的，既有其乐融融的温暖，也有掠人心肺的寒凉。

remMethod.val: cardio(有氧的) + pulmonary(肺部的) → 肺部的有氧活动 → 心肺的

trans.tranCn: 心肺的； 与心肺有关的
trans.tranOther: of, relating to, or affecting the heart and lungs
